title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook bacon until crisp, then set aside.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine hot pasta with bacon, remove from heat, then add egg-cheese mixture.
Toss quickly and season with black pepper.
